video.title: Futurama
video.synopsis: A pizza delivery boy awakens in the 31st century after 1,000 years of cryogenic preservation and finds a job at an interplanetary delivery service.

episodes.synopsis: A pizza delivery boy named Fry awakens from a state of suspended animation and finds himself in a world populated by aliens, robots and spaceships.
episodes.title: Space Pilot 3000

episodes.synopsis: Fry eagerly anticipates his first visit to the Moon ... only to realize that it is home to a cheesy amusement park.
episodes.title: The Series Has Landed

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Bender become a futuristic odd couple when they attempt to share an apartment.
episodes.title: I, Roommate

episodes.synopsis: Leela finds herself the object of a starship captain's amorous advances.
episodes.title: Love's Labours Lost in Space

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Leela find themselves trapped on a planet ruled by human-hating robots.
episodes.title: Fear of a Bot Planet

episodes.synopsis: Fry discovers that a small amount of money left in his old bank account has accumulated into a fortune.
episodes.title: A Fishful of Dollars

episodes.synopsis: Fry finds himself the ruler of an alien world after he accidentally consumes the planet's emperor.
episodes.title: My Three Suns

episodes.synopsis: A colossal chunk of stinking garbage threatens to destroy New New York City.
episodes.title: A Big Piece of Garbage

episodes.synopsis: Bender seeks religion after becoming addicted to electricity.
episodes.title: Hell Is Other Robots

episodes.synopsis: As the planet express team vacations aboard the starship Titanic, the vessel falls victim to the gravitational pull of a black hole.
episodes.title: A Flight to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Fry enrolls in Mars University, only to find that his dorm roommate is an intelligent monkey; Bender teaches a fraternity of robots how to be cool.
episodes.title: Mars University

episodes.synopsis: Fry and his friends fight off an alien invasion by re-creating a TV drama from the 20th century featuring a scantily clad single female lawyer.
episodes.title: When Aliens Attack

episodes.synopsis: Fry wins a contest that takes the crew on a tour of the slurm factory ... and exposes its terrible secret.
episodes.title: Fry and the Slurm Factory

episodes.synopsis: After Bender flushes Nibbler down a toilet, Fry, Leela and Bender journey through a sewer system inhabited by mutants.
episodes.title: I Second That Emotion

episodes.synopsis: After being court-martialed, Zapp Brannigan joins the Planet Express team ... only to inspire Fry and Bender to mutiny against Leela.
episodes.title: Brannigan, Begin Again

episodes.synopsis: When the price of titanium skyrockets, Bender hocks his titanium-rich body to a pawn shop and lives the good life.
episodes.title: A Head in the Polls

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Leela find themselves targeted by a murderous robotic Santa Claus; Bender volunteers at a shelter for homeless robots.
episodes.title: Xmas Story

episodes.synopsis: When Zoidberg runs amok during mating season, Fry sets out to teach him how to woo a mate.
episodes.title: Why Must I Be a Crustacean in Love?

episodes.synopsis: Fry fears the worst when Bender's exact duplicate joins the crew on a mission to deliver a valuable atomic tiara to the Miss Universe pageant.
episodes.title: The Lesser of Two Evils

episodes.synopsis: Valentine's Day turns into a nightmare for Fry after his head is surgically attached to Amy's body.
episodes.title: Put Your Head on My Shoulder

episodes.synopsis: Bender's popularity soars when he becomes a successful professional wrestler, but when he is instructed to lose a fight, Leela steps in.
episodes.title: Raging Bender

episodes.synopsis: Leela finally encounters another member of her race. But when he turns out to be a jerk, she fears leaving him will mean her species' extinction.
episodes.title: A Bicyclops Built for Two

episodes.synopsis: The professor chooses his clone, Cubert, as the successor to his research ... only to realize that Cubert has dreams of his own.
episodes.title: A Clone of My Own

episodes.synopsis: Hermes grows despondent when he misses an opportunity for a promotion, while a female bureaucrat is turned on by Fry's sloppiness.
episodes.title: How Hermes Requisitioned His Groove Back

episodes.synopsis: Deep beneath the ocean, the crew discovers the lost city of Atlantis, where Fry falls hopelessly in love with a mermaid.
episodes.title: The Deep South

episodes.synopsis: After joining the robot Mafia, Bender finds himself involved in scheme to loot the Planet Express spaceship of its cargo and destroy the crew.
episodes.title: Bender Gets Made

episodes.synopsis: On Mother's Day, Mom unleashes a hoard of rampaging robots to destroy Earth -- and only the professor can stop them.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: Alien beings threaten to devour of all mankind after the Planet Express crew inadvertently introduces earthlings to the aliens' tasty offspring.
episodes.title: The Problem with Popplers

episodes.synopsis: A "what-if" machine simulates wishes: Bender turns into a gigantic robot; Leela murders her friends; and Al Gore and Stephen Hawking rescue Fry.
episodes.title: Anthology of Interest I

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Bender face off against an army of aliens on a far-off planet after they join the army to qualify for military discounts.
episodes.title: War Is the H-Word

episodes.synopsis: When Bender inherits a castle from his deceased uncle, he finds himself being pursued by a terrifying, driverless car.
episodes.title: The Honking

episodes.synopsis: A woman from Fry's past unthaws in the year 3000, but when she feels out of place, she and Fry journey a thousand years into the future.
episodes.title: The Cryonic Woman

episodes.synopsis: A miniature version of the Planet Express crew tries to rid Fry's body of parasitic worms. Meanwhile, Leela finds Fry's new personality irresistible.
episodes.title: Parasites Lost

episodes.synopsis: Fry and the others find themselves trapped on a planet of Amazonian women ruled by a man-hating computer.
episodes.title: Amazon Women in the Mood

episodes.synopsis: Bender finds true romance with a co-worker after crossing a picket line, but jealousy over his love's ex-boyfriend threatens to destroy everything.
episodes.title: Bendless Love

episodes.synopsis: Leela fights to save the lives of penguins after the Planet Express ship is involved in an oil spill on Pluto.
episodes.title: The Birdbot of Ice-catraz

episodes.synopsis: Fry searches the ruins of Old New York for his lucky clover... only to conclude that his older brother stole not only the clover, but his life.
episodes.title: The Luck of the Fryrish

episodes.synopsis: Tired of feeling like an outcast, Leela has a second eye grafted onto her face; Bender adopts 12 children after learning about a government stipend.
episodes.title: The Cyber House Rules

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Bender become inadvertent participants in a bank robbery and are sentenced to a robot insane asylum.
episodes.title: Insane in the Mainframe

episodes.synopsis: Fry realizes a lifelong dream by dating a Lucy Liu robot.
episodes.title: I Dated a Robot

episodes.synopsis: Only Fry can save Earth when evil brains from another world plot to make everyone stupid.
episodes.title: The Day the Earth Stood Stupid

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Zoidberg promises his uncle -- washed-up comedian Harold Zoid -- that he will invest a million dollars in his Hollywood movie.
episodes.title: That's Lobstertainment!

episodes.synopsis: Bender is broken in a freak accident, but meets Beck, who launches him on a singing career that turns him into a hero for other broken robots.
episodes.title: Bendin' in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: While creating a team of mutants to play the Harlem Globetrotters, the professor accidentally causes a disruption in time that threatens the universe.
episodes.title: Time Keeps on Slipping

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, Bender faces execution when he fills in for the murderous Santa robot.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Santas

episodes.synopsis: Although Kif, Amy's boyfriend, retrieves her parents' buggalo herd and rescues Amy when she is kidnapped, they still refuse to accept him.
episodes.title: Where the Buggalo Roam

episodes.synopsis: Leela believes she is a pioneer for women's athletics when she becomes the first female major league blernsball player.
episodes.title: A Leela of Her Own

episodes.synopsis: Bender's longing to be remembered motivates him to become a tyrannical pharaoh on Osiris 4.
episodes.title: A Pharoah to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Bender accidentally gets shot out into the heavens and becomes God to a race of tiny aliens, only to fail in that position and meet the real thing.
episodes.title: Godfellas

episodes.synopsis: A cryogenically frozen 1980s guy is thawed, becomes the CEO of the failing Planet Express company, and threatens to have it gutted by a competitor.
episodes.title: Future Stock

episodes.synopsis: When the Planet Express ship travels through time to Roswell, New Mexico, in 1947, Fry becomes his own progeny.
episodes.title: Roswell That Ends Well

episodes.synopsis: When the professor fine tunes his "what-if" machine, Bender becomes human, Fry lives life as a video game, and Leela finds her true home.
episodes.title: Anthology of Interest: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bender learns to cook and competes against pretentious chef Elzar; Dr. Zoidberg is struck with remorse when he frames Fry for his own misdeed.
episodes.title: 30% Iron Chef

episodes.synopsis: Leela finally learns the truth about her parents and her own identity.
episodes.title: Leela's Homeworld

episodes.synopsis: As Valentine's Day approaches, Bender's romance with the Planet Express ship puts the crew in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Love and Rocket

episodes.synopsis: The crew finds itself pitted against the cast of "Star Trek" when an energy creature seeks to determine who is more worthy of his fanatical devotion.
episodes.title: Where No Fan Has Gone Before

episodes.synopsis: When Earth is jeopardized by global warming, the crew attends a conference hosted by Al Gore's head.
episodes.title: Crimes of the Hot

episodes.synopsis: Bender grows jealous when Fry attempts to clone his beloved fossilized dog.
episodes.title: Jurassic Bark

episodes.synopsis: Hermes's and the professor's sons try to outdo them in the business world; Bender becomes a brewmeister.
episodes.title: The Route of All Evil

episodes.synopsis: In celebration of Freedom Day, Dr. Zoidberg eats the Earth flag, for which he is sentenced to death. To retaliate, the Decapodians enslave the world.
episodes.title: A Taste of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: When Kif gets pregnant, Amy questions her readiness to become a parent.
episodes.title: Kif Gets Knocked Up a Notch

episodes.synopsis: When Fry and Leela discover a mysterious cream that gives them unusual powers, they form a superhero team along with Bender.
episodes.title: Less Than Hero

episodes.synopsis: The crew is exposed to a substance that causes everyone to revert to teenagers. The problem gets worse after the professor tries to fix it.
episodes.title: Teenage Mutant Leela's Hurdles

episodes.synopsis: Nibbler enlists Fry in a mission to blow up evil brains bent on destroying the universe; Fry travels into the past to stop himself from being frozen.
episodes.title: The Why of Fry

episodes.synopsis: A killer bee sting sends Leela on a long, strange trip.
episodes.title: Sting

episodes.synopsis: The Planet Express crew goes to a parallel universe made accessible by Professor Farnsworth's latest experiment.
episodes.title: The Farnsworth Parabox

episodes.synopsis: When each Earthican receives a $300 government refund, the Planet Express crew members pursue their respective dreams and desires.
episodes.title: Three Hundred Big Boys

episodes.synopsis: When Fry succeeds in retrieving his nose, which was taken by aliens, a more precious appendage of his is placed in peril.
episodes.title: Spanish Fry

episodes.synopsis: Bender's scam to win Olympic gold sets him on the road to becoming a celebrity wife.
episodes.title: Bend Her

episodes.synopsis: A new model of robot threatens Bender, prompting him to go on a trip while upgrading his own technology.
episodes.title: Obsoletely Fabulous

episodes.synopsis: Bender becomes a television star as well as a terrible role model for children.
episodes.title: Bender Should Not Be Allowed on TV

episodes.synopsis: Fry makes a deal with the Robot Devil so he can become a skillful musician and win Leela's heart.
episodes.title: The Devil's Hands Are Idle Playthings

episodes.synopsis: The wacky Planet Express crew returns and soon finds themselves victimized by scheming alien nudists who control Bender through a computer virus.
episodes.title: Bender's Big Score

episodes.synopsis: The Planet Express crew works overtime to seal a portal between their world and an alternate universe in this feature spinoff of the animated series.
episodes.title: The Beast with a Billion Backs

episodes.synopsis: When Leela loses her cool, Farnsworth orders her to wear an electrical collar to control her temper. Bender loses his mind over Dungeons and Dragons.
episodes.title: Bender's Game

episodes.synopsis: In New Mars Vegas, Fry gains the power to read minds and competes in a poker tournament; Bender has an affair with the Donbot's showgirl wife.
episodes.title: Into the Wild Green Yonder

episodes.synopsis: After a devastating spaceship crash, the Professor attempts to resuscitate the crew with his birth machine.
episodes.title: Rebirth

episodes.synopsis: Leela and Zapp find themselves stranded on an Eden-like planet.
episodes.title: In-A-Gadda-Da-Leela

episodes.synopsis: Fry posts an embarrassing video of Leela online.
episodes.title: Attack of the Killer App

episodes.synopsis: Bender leads a campaign to legalize robosexual marriage between humans and robots.
episodes.title: Proposition Infinity

episodes.synopsis: The crew races to future Rome to unearth the shocking secret of Leonardo da Vinci.
episodes.title: The Duh-Vinci Code

episodes.synopsis: Bender learns that he suffers from a mortal manufacturing defect.
episodes.title: Lethal Inspection

episodes.synopsis: The Professor invents a one-way time machine that takes the crew ever further into the future with no hope of returning.
episodes.title: The Late Philip J. Fry

episodes.synopsis: Earth is invaded by a race of intelligent cats.
episodes.title: That Darn Katz!

episodes.synopsis: The theory of evolution is put to the test on a planet inhabited by robots.
episodes.title: A Clockwork Origin

episodes.synopsis: A revolutionary invention allows the crew members to exchange minds.
episodes.title: The Prisoner of Benda

episodes.synopsis: After a bungled Earth invasion, alien leader Lrrr faces a midlife crisis.
episodes.title: Lrrreconcilable Ndndifferences

episodes.synopsis: Leela leads an army of underground mutants in a rebellion against the surface people.
episodes.title: The Mutants Are Revolting

episodes.synopsis: In this three-part episode, the crew races to preserve the traditional practices of the classic holidays of Christmas, Robanukah and Kwanzaa.
episodes.title: Holiday Spectacular

episodes.synopsis: After testifying against the Robot Mafia, Bender goes into hiding in the witness relocation program.
episodes.title: The Silence of the Clamps

episodes.synopsis: Leela becomes obsessed with hunting down a mysterious four-dimensional space whale.
episodes.title: Mobius Dick

episodes.synopsis: Fry quits his job and becomes a police officer assigned to the Future Crimes Division.
episodes.title: Law & Oracle

episodes.synopsis: Bender gains the ability to self-replicate, threatening to overrun Earth with vast swarms of copies of himself.
episodes.title: Benderama

episodes.synopsis: The crew uncovers a dark secret concerning a covert mission undertaken by the Professor and Dr. Zoidberg many years earlier.
episodes.title: The Tip of the Zoidberg

episodes.synopsis: When Bender dies, his disembodied software begins haunting the Planet Express building.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machines

episodes.synopsis: The crew members encounter a bizarre alien with the power to change their sexual characteristics.
episodes.title: Neutopia

episodes.synopsis: Leela becomes a Hollywood big shot after creating a hit children's television series.
episodes.title: Yo Leela Leela

episodes.synopsis: Fry nurtures an alien egg that hatches into a horrific monster.
episodes.title: Fry Am the Egg Man

episodes.synopsis: The crew members alter history when they travel back in time to the American Revolution.
episodes.title: All the Presidents' Heads

episodes.synopsis: Fry's sneezing reintroduces the common cold to the world of the future, with devastating consequences.
episodes.title: Cold Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Bender evolves into a godlike being after vastly increasing his processing power.
episodes.title: Overclockwise

episodes.synopsis: Futurama is reconceived in three alternate animation styles: classic black-and-white, old-school videogame and Japanese anime.
episodes.title: Reincarnation

episodes.synopsis: Bender must come to terms with his paternal side after fathering a baby robot with Bev, a vending machine that the Professor brings on board.
episodes.title: The Bots and the Bees

episodes.synopsis: It's the year 3012, and the Planet Express crew discovers an ancient Martian calendar that predicts the final destruction of Earth in the year... 3012.
episodes.title: A Farewell to Arms

episodes.synopsis: An enigmatic politician runs for office against Richard Nixon's head, but can he produce his "Earth certificate" to prove where he was born?
episodes.title: Decision 3012

episodes.synopsis: Bender discovers that a famous actor who always wears a bag over his head is a parasitic alien that feeds off the mindless adulation of his fans.
episodes.title: The Thief of Baghead

episodes.synopsis: When Leela's parents divorce, her mom takes up with Zapp Brannigan, who is embroiled in some ill-advised negotiations with a fierce alien race.
episodes.title: Zapp Dingbat

episodes.synopsis: When Leela and Amy run out of a drug that helps them compete in a gladiator-style combat competition, Fry and the gang must find a fresh supply.
episodes.title: The Butterjunk Effect

episodes.synopsis: Demoralized after getting fired for inefficiency, Hermes goes in for a series of increasingly drastic robotic upgrades to his human body.
episodes.title: The Six Million Dollar Mon

episodes.synopsis: Thought by his crewmates to have fallen into a sausage-making machine during Oktoberfest, amnesia-ridden Fry joins a forgotten band of Neanderthals.
episodes.title: Fun on a Bun

episodes.synopsis: After a brush with the law for his despicable behavior, Bender goes on a spiritual odyssey to discover whether robots have free will.
episodes.title: Free Will Hunting

episodes.synopsis: Fry tracks down the Professor's aging parents aboard the Near-Death Star, an orbiting retirement home, but the reunion quickly turns sour.
episodes.title: Near-Death Wish

episodes.synopsis: After failing to get a legal ban on the cruel practice of robot-fox hunting, Fry, Leela and Bender take matters into their own hands.
episodes.title: 31st Century Fox

episodes.synopsis: When the Robot Mafia takes over a Martian casino owned by Amy's parents, the crew turns to Doctor Zoidberg to rob the joint and set things right.
episodes.title: Viva Mars Vegas

episodes.synopsis: Fry, Leela and the rest of the Planet Express crew are reimagined as salmon, elephant seals and other critters in a TV nature documentary.
episodes.title: Naturama

episodes.synopsis: Professor Farnsworth joins a gang of street-racing punks.
episodes.title: 2-D Blacktop

episodes.synopsis: Fry and Leela's romantic vacation goes disturbingly wrong.
episodes.title: Fry and Leela's Big Fling

episodes.synopsis: After being marooned on an distant planet, Fry is befriended by a young monster.
episodes.title: T.: The Terrestrial

episodes.synopsis: At a maximum security prison, Bender meets a famous folk singer and attempts to make a copy of his precious guitar.
episodes.title: Forty Percent Leadbelly

episodes.synopsis: Bender becomes a famous firefighter, but the crew suspects him of arson.
episodes.title: The Inhuman Torch

episodes.synopsis: The Futurama gang stars in a trio of craptastic morning cartoons.
episodes.title: Saturday Morning Fun Pit

episodes.synopsis: Bender goes grave-robbing to bring his favorite actor back to life.
episodes.title: Calculon 2.0

episodes.synopsis: Bender searches the universe for his missing shiny metal rear end.
episodes.title: Assie Come Home

episodes.synopsis: After a rare condition causes Leela to grow tentacles, she stumbles upon a secret genetic engineering facility.
episodes.title: Leela and the Genestalk

episodes.synopsis: The crew journeys into Fry's dreams to seek the meaning of a mysterious alien melody.
episodes.title: Game of Tones

episodes.synopsis: The crew becomes trapped aboard ship with a horrific alien creature.
episodes.title: Murder On the Planet Express

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Zoidberg meets the love of his life while Bender squares off in a deadly tap dancing competition.
episodes.title: Stench and Stenchibility

episodes.synopsis: Fry asks Leela to marry him, and they face their destiny together as the Professor's latest invention alters the fabric of time.
episodes.title: Meanwhile
